{
  DoubleVect a(5);
  ArrOfInt c(5);
  int i;
  a[0]=-10.1;
  a[1]=8.3;
  a[2]=7.31;
  a[3]=7.3;
  a[4]=7.1;
  Cerr << "a before selecting "  << finl;
  for (i=0; i<5; i++) Cerr << a[i] << " ";
  Cerr << finl;
  trier (a,c);
  Cerr << "a after selecting " << finl;
  for ( i=0; i<5; i++) Cerr << a[c[i]] << " ";
  Cerr << finl;
  trier_abs (a,c);
  Cerr << "a after selecting abs " << finl;
  for ( i=0; i<5; i++) Cerr << a[c[i]] << " ";
  Cerr << finl;
}
